00028 #include "qep_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qhsm_ini)
00032 
00033 
00039 /*..........................................................................*/
00040 void QHsm_init(QHsm *me, QEvent const *e) {
00041     QStateHandler t;
00042     QS_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00043 
00044                            /* the top-most initial transition must be taken */
00045     Q_ALLEGE((*me->state)(me, e) == Q_RET_TRAN);
00046 
00047     t = (QStateHandler)&QHsm_top;            /* HSM starts in the top state */
00048     do {                                        /* drill into the target... */
00049         QStateHandler path[QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_];
00050         int8_t ip = (int8_t)0;               /* transition entry path index */
00051 
00052 
00053         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_INIT, QS_smObj_, me)
00054             QS_OBJ_(me);                       /* this state machine object */
00055             QS_FUN_(t);                                 /* the source state */
00056             QS_FUN_(me->state);     /* the target of the initial transition */
00057         QS_END_()
00058 
00059         path[0] = me->state;
00060         (void)QEP_TRIG_(me->state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00061         while (me->state != t) {
00062             ++ip;
00063             path[ip] = me->state;
00064             (void)QEP_TRIG_(me->state, QEP_EMPTY_SIG_);
00065         }
00066         me->state = path[0];
00067                                             /* entry path must not overflow */
00068         Q_ASSERT(ip < (int8_t)QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_);
00069 
00070         do {        /* retrace the entry path in reverse (desired) order... */
00071             QEP_ENTER_(path[ip]);                         /* enter path[ip] */
00072             --ip;
00073         } while (ip >= (int8_t)0);
00074 
00075         t = path[0];                /* current state becomes the new source */
00076     } while (QEP_TRIG_(t, Q_INIT_SIG) == Q_RET_TRAN);
00077     me->state = t;
00078 
00079     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_INIT_TRAN, QS_smObj_, me)
00080         QS_TIME_();                                           /* time stamp */
00081         QS_OBJ_(me);                           /* this state machine object */
00082         QS_FUN_(me->state);                         /* the new active state */
00083     QS_END_()
00084 }
